item.description:
Hi All,

Grabbed a couple of last minute tee times (beginning at 12:40pm) over at Hillview Country Club in North Reading in case anyone is around tomorrow. Nothing fancy about this place, but it's a nice local course. You can choose to walk or ride, just play 9 (the front is fairly easy to walk) or play the full 18.

http://www.hillviewgc.com

I don't think this course really has a 19th hole, but if you're in need of refreshments afterwards, The Horseshoe Grille is just down the street on Rte 28. They have a nice bar as well as an outdoor patio. I don't formally organize anything here, but sometimes people like to spontaneously gather there after their round.

http://www.horseshoegrille.com/

As always, please try to be checked in 15-20 minutes early so we can organize ourselves, and try to remember to give me a dollar at the start so we can help reimburse Amy for this year's Meetup license. Thanks!

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Hillview CC - Play 9 or 18
